title: What the font is this font?
content:
I saw it on A2/SW/HK site ( [http://www.a2swhk.co.uk](http://web.archive.org/web/20081203230300/http:/www.a2swhk.co.uk/ "http://www.a2swhk.co.uk")).

I asked them by emial and they never answered…

Anybody knows?

thanks a bunch

juan

comments.content:
Did they really designed this font for the book, or they only designed that one on the cover.

Thankyou!

juan
I believe their site mentions custom (bespoke) typeface design.
